Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of Cushi (כּוּשִׁי) descendant of King Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► ancestor of the prophet (נָבִיא) Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּה) ► ancestor of the prophet (נָבִיא) Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► ancestor of prophet (נָבִיא) Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָה)
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► father of Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: to take away|to destroy|to sweep away
Node.definition: = action by which someone removes another person from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to humans (אָדָם) birds (עֹוף) reptiles (רֶמֶשׂ) insects (שֶׁרֶץ) and fish (דָּג)

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to stretch out (one's) arm; hence: = action by which deities prepare to punish to humans
literally: to stretch out (one's) arm; hence: = action by which deities prepare to punish to humans

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= male deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי) ≈ regarded as the possessor of a certain location

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= person serving a foreign deity as priest
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= the structure forming the upper covering of a building, usually built as a terrace, to which one goes up by stairs

Node.gloss: host of heaven|sun, moon, and stars
Node.definition: = collective of all celestial bodies that give light; ◄ created by God; ► often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; ≈ in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= action by which humans or deities use an oath to solemnly declare that they will be true to other humans or deities
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= deity; ► worshipped by Ammonites (עַמֹּונִי) usually vocalized as מִלְכֹם (מִלְכֹּם)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= action by which humans stop talking
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= causative action by which humans or deities set apart humans or objects for a particular purpose or activity relating to the service of God, as a result of which they become holy (קָדֹושׁ)
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action by which humans put on clothes or ornaments
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
= action by which someone puts one leg in front of the other in order to move forward, with the specific intention to avoid touching an object that is located under one's feet
= strip of wood or stone at the bottom of a doorway

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= causative action or process by which deities cause a location to be dominated by a certain activity, to the extent that it dominates everything else, ◄ as if it were completely filled with that event

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= goods obtained from someone else through extortion and aggression

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= gate of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► probably the one through which fish merchants came into the city
= action by which humans utter a high pitched cry to give expression to their grief and distress
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= action by which humans utter a high pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
literally: mortar; exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a relatively low part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) used as market area, ◄ referred to as such because of its mortar like shape
= process by which humans or objects are removed from existence, through death or total destruction
= a class of people who engage in commerce and trade
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= action by which humans carefully examine a place in order to find people or objects located in it or in order to gain information about it

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= small container ◄ made out of earthenware, ► filled with oil (שֶׁמֶן) and with a wick (פִּשְׁתָּה) placed in it; sometimes placed on a lampstand (מְנֹורָה) used as a source of light (אֹור) ≈ associated with peace, stability and well being
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence

Node.gloss: to set|to thicken|to congeal|to become concentrated
Node.definition: = process by which liquids become relatively more solid than before ► and so flow less easily or completely stop flowing
= sediments of wine (יַיִן) left in a container; ≈ the image of wine resting on its dregs is often used to denote an attitude of complacency

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is morally and/or ethically right
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way
= objects that people possess in a relatively large quantity; ≈ greatly valued by the owner, strongly coveted by other people, and a cause of status

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= process by which a moment in time is about to happen
= process by which an event happens without delay

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which condition or action is motivated or accompanied by deep distress
= action by which warriors cry with a loud voice, ► trying to intimidate their opponents
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= state in which humans experience distress

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which buildings and infrastructure have been totally destroyed
= state in which buildings and infrastructure have been totally destroyed

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with suffering and lack of wisdom

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an area has been made inaccessible and strong, beyond the reach of others, such as enemies, ◄ usually by surrounding it by a high wall
= state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

= a causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to experience extreme anxiety, ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances, as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped place from which there is no escape
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= state in which a person or animal is unable to see
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
literally: to pour out blood; hence: = to wound or kill an animate being

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = the flesh of the human body, possibly referring more specifically to the bowels or entrails
= waste matter remaining after food has been digested, discharged from the bowels of humans and animals

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

= process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= literally: finish; hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans and objects to completely disappear from existance
= particle marking a constituent as prominent, as if limiting the focus to a restricted number of entities

Node.gloss: to be quick|to be hasty|to be rash|sudden
Node.definition: = action by which humans or divine beings act quickly

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
